name: Mississippi
notes:
Negatives = Total - Positives.
Hospitalizations are calculated by calculating multiplying % of hospitalized times total cases, pending clarification from the state. Recoveries are estimated, and updated twice weekly. As of April 27, Mississippi is reporting people tested.
As of 5/23, MS started separating out PCR and antibody tests. Total tests might be impacted. MS notes that hospitalization data for 5/23 is incomplete.
